location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.4368 of 1853 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government, Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is a confirmation of receipt of Kemball's previous letter (folios 350-51) regarding the extent of the season's slave trade on the Arab coast of the Gulf. Malet writes that that the Honourable Company's steamer Queenwas despatched to the Gulf on 27 August, to help in naval efforts to suppress the season's trade.
